relevantProvisions.title: Effect of Listing
relevantProvisions.applicationToScenario: This provision applies because two potential suppliers are proposed for debarment, which means they are excluded from receiving contracts unless a compelling reason is determined by the agency head.

relevantProvisions.title: Total Small Business Set-Asides
relevantProvisions.applicationToScenario: The procurement must be set aside for small businesses as the value exceeds the micro-purchase threshold but not the simplified acquisition threshold, and there are at least five small businesses capable of providing the equipment.

relevantProvisions.title: Sustainable Acquisition Policy
relevantProvisions.applicationToScenario: The agency's sustainability initiative requires that the office equipment, such as computers and printers, be ENERGY STAR certified, aligning with the sustainable acquisition policy.

complianceIssues.correctiveAction: Establish a documented supplier qualification process to ensure all suppliers meet quality standards and are checked against government exclusion lists.
Implement written documentation for quality requirements communicated to suppliers to ensure compliance and traceability.
Develop a formal conflict of interest policy and require disclosure of any personal relationships with suppliers to prevent biased decision-making.

scenarioDecisions.correctAction: Verify the supplier's certification through the industry database or obtain updated certification before proceeding with the purchase to ensure compliance with supplier qualification standards.
Require detailed documentation of the supply chain to verify the 'conflict-free' status of minerals and ensure compliance with SEC reporting requirements.
Request updated SDS in the GHS format to ensure compliance with current hazardous materials documentation requirements before purchasing.
Consider the qualified small business to meet small business subcontracting goals, ensuring compliance with federal contract requirements for small business utilization.
